short_summary: Electrical Engineering Consultant Services for the design of required electrical infrastructure for a dedicated berth at Wood Islands, PE and Caribou, NS ferry terminals
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada (TC) have a requirement for Electrical Engineering Consultant Services for the design of required electrical infrastructure for a dedicated berth at Wood Islands, PE and Caribou, NS ferry terminals to accommodate the new vessel.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title:
EB144-231265: Wood Island - Caribou New Berths Electrical Engineering Consultation Services

#### Reference Information
* Solicitation Number: WS3779229038
* Amendment Number: 5
* Published Date: 2022-12-14
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-24T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-01-20

#### Project Overview
The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada (TC) invites qualified firms to provide Electrical Engineering Consultation Services for the design of required electrical infrastructure for a dedicated berth at Wood Islands, Prince Edward Island, and Caribou, Nova Scotia, ferry terminals to accommodate the new vessel.

#### Scope of Services
The consultant will be responsible for providing electrical engineering services, including the design of electrical infrastructure, to support the new ferry terminal projects.

#### Pre-Qualified Firms
The following firms are pre-qualified and invited to participate in this project:
* Stantec Consulting Ltd.
* Fundy Engineering & Consulting Ltd.
* M&R Engineering Limited
* CBCL Limited
* Eastpoint Engineering Limited
* Peerless Consulting Ltd.
* R.A. Smith & Associates Limited
* SNC-Lavalin Inc.
* RSEI Consultants Ltd.
* exp Services Inc.
* Tweedie & Associates Consulting
* Argyll Associates Limited
* Wood Canada Limited (formerly AMEC)
* AECOM Canada Ltd.
* Dumac Energy Limited
* MCW Maricor
* WSP Canada Inc.
* Coles Associates
* EA Engineering Inc.
* HDK Consulting Incorporated
* Strum Engineering Associates Ltd. 
* Roy Consultants 
* Dillon Consulting Limited
* Pageau Morel et associés inc.
* Englobe Corp.
* Hatch Mott MacDonald Ltd.

#### Request for Proposal
A Request for Proposal (RFP) document, which includes all the necessary requirements and specifications, can be obtained from the following contact:

* Name: Grant, Stewart (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: The tender is now expired, and the RFP document is no longer available.
